name: news-fetch-api
description: - Wanted to practice creating a fetch api - Requested news feed from NewsApi - created navbar menu that pulls specific news sources     - US     - World     - Politics     - Business     - Tabloid     - My News  - added a search box for the user to enter a topic of their choosing to view     - the user enters the topic and then presses enter     - added a function to the search field to capitalize the first letter of every word
author: Ron Vargas
